fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Stand guard at an unauthorized target's house during the night. 1 Use.
- Shoot an authorized target during the night. 1 Use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When standing guard at an unauthorized target's house, you will attack one of their visitors. Evils & Neutrals are prioritized first.
- If you successfully kill a player who can't win with the Sentries, you will gain an extra use of your second ability.
